00014 #ifndef ATOMIC_QUEUE_H_
00015 #define ATOMIC_QUEUE_H_
00016 
00017 #include <atomic.h>
00018 #include <memory>
00019 
00020 template <typename T, unsigned int SIZE, typename const_ref = T>
00021 class atomic_nonzero_pod_queue
00022 {
00023 public:
00024     struct nospace_error {};
00025 
00026     atomic_nonzero_pod_queue() : m_pFirst(m_ptrs), m_pLast(m_ptrs), m_count(0) {
00027         memset(m_ptrs, 0, SIZE * sizeof(T));
00028     }
00029 
00030     void push(T t) {
00031         ASSERT(t);
00032         writeBarrier();
00033         for(;;) {
00034             if(m_count == SIZE) {
00035                 readBarrier();
00036                 if(m_count == SIZE)
00037                     throw nospace_error();
00038             }
00039             T *last = m_pLast;
00040             T *first = m_pFirst;
00041             readBarrier();
00042             while(*last != 0) {
00043                 last++;
00044                 if(last == &m_ptrs[SIZE]) {
00045                     readBarrier();
00046                     last = m_ptrs;
00047                 }
00048                 if(last == first) {
00049                     break;
00050                 }
00051             }
00052             if(atomicCompareAndSet((T)0, t, last)) {
00053                 m_pLast = last;
00054                 break;
00055             }
00056         }
00057         atomicInc(&m_count);
00058         writeBarrier();
00059     }
00060     //! This is not reentrant.
00061     void pop() {
00062         ASSERT(*m_pFirst);
00063         *m_pFirst = 0;
00064         atomicDec(&m_count);
00065         writeBarrier();
00066     }
00067     //! This is not reentrant.
00068     T front() {
00069         T *first = m_pFirst;
00070         readBarrier();
00071         while(*first == 0) {
00072             first++;
00073             if(first == &m_ptrs[SIZE]) {
00074                 first = m_ptrs;
00075                 readBarrier();
00076             }
00077         }
00078         m_pFirst = first;
00079         writeBarrier();
00080         readBarrier();
00081         return *first;
00082     }
00083     //! This is not reentrant.
00084     bool empty() const {
00085         readBarrier();
00086         return m_count == 0;
00087     }
00088     unsigned int size() const {
00089         readBarrier();
00090         return m_count;
00091     }
00092 
00093     //! Try to pop the front item.
00094     //! \arg item to be released.
00095     //! \return true if succeeded.
00096     bool atomicPop(const_ref item) {
00097         ASSERT(item);
00098         if(atomicCompareAndSet((T)item, (T)0, m_pFirst)) {
00099             atomicDec(&m_count);
00100             writeBarrier();
00101             return true;
00102         }
00103         return false;
00104     }
00105     //! Try to obtain the front item.
00106     const_ref atomicFront() {
00107         if(empty())
00108             return 0L;
00109         T *first = m_pFirst;
00110         readBarrier();
00111         while(*first == 0) {
00112             first++;
00113             if(first == &m_ptrs[SIZE]) {
00114                 first = m_ptrs;
00115                 if(empty())
00116                     return 0L;
00117             }
00118         }
00119         m_pFirst = first;
00120         readBarrier();
00121         return *first;
00122     }
00123     T atomicPopAny() {
00124         if(empty())
00125             return 0L;
00126         T *first = m_pFirst;
00127         readBarrier();
00128         for(;;) {
00129             if(*first) {
00130                 T obj = atomicSwap((T)0, first);
00131                 if(obj) {
00132                     m_pFirst = first;
00133                     atomicDec(&m_count);
00134                     writeBarrier();
00135                     readBarrier();
00136                     return obj;
00137                 }
00138             }
00139             first++;
00140             if(first == &m_ptrs[SIZE]) {
00141                 first = m_ptrs;
00142                 if(empty())
00143                     return 0L;
00144             }
00145         }
00146     }
00147 private:
00148     T m_ptrs[SIZE];
00149     T *m_pFirst;
00150     T *m_pLast;
00151     unsigned int m_count;
00152 };
00153 
00154 template <typename T, unsigned int SIZE>
00155 class atomic_pointer_queue : public atomic_nonzero_pod_queue<T*, SIZE, const T*> {};
00156 
00157 //! Atomic FIFO for copy-constructable class.
00158 template <typename T, unsigned int SIZE>
00159 class atomic_queue
00160 {
00161 public:
00162     typedef typename atomic_pointer_queue<T, SIZE>::nospace_error nospace_error;
00163 
00164     atomic_queue() {}
00165     ~atomic_queue() {
00166         while(!empty()) pop();
00167     }
00168 
00169     void push(const T&t) {
00170         T *obj = new T(t);
00171         try {
00172             m_queue.push(obj);
00173         }
00174         catch (nospace_error &e) {
00175             delete obj;
00176             throw e;
00177         }
00178     }
00179     //! This is not reentrant.
00180     void pop() {
00181         delete m_queue.front();
00182         m_queue.pop();
00183     }
00184     //! This is not reentrant.
00185     T &front() {
00186         return *m_queue.front();
00187     }
00188     //! This is not reentrant.
00189     bool empty() const {
00190         return m_queue.empty();
00191     }
00192     unsigned int size() const {
00193         return m_queue.size();
00194     }
00195 private:
00196     atomic_pointer_queue<T, SIZE> m_queue;
00197 };
00198 
00199 //! Atomic FIFO for copieable class.
00200 template <typename T, unsigned int SIZE>
00201 class atomic_queue_reserved
00202 {
00203 public:
00204     typedef typename atomic_pointer_queue<T, SIZE>::nospace_error nospace_error;
00205     typedef uint_cas_max key;
00206 
00207     atomic_queue_reserved() {
00208         C_ASSERT(SIZE < (1uL << (sizeof(key) * 8 - 8)));
00209         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < SIZE; i++) {
00210             m_reservoir.push(key_index_serial(i, 0));
00211         }
00212     }
00213     ~atomic_queue_reserved() {
00214         while(!empty()) pop();
00215         ASSERT(m_reservoir.size() == SIZE);
00216     }
00217 
00218     void push(const T&t) {
00219         key pack = m_reservoir.atomicPopAny();
00220         if(!pack)
00221             throw nospace_error();
00222         int idx = key2index(pack);
00223         m_array[idx] = t;
00224         int serial = key2serial(pack) + 1;
00225         pack = key_index_serial(idx, serial);
00226         try {
00227             m_queue.push(pack);
00228         }
00229         catch (nospace_error&e) {
00230             try {
00231                 m_reservoir.push(pack);
00232             }
00233             catch (nospace_error&) {
00234                 abort();
00235             }
00236             throw e;
00237         }
00238     }
00239     //! This is not reentrant.
00240     void pop() {
00241         key pack = m_queue.front();
00242         m_queue.pop();
00243         try {
00244             m_reservoir.push(pack);
00245         }
00246         catch (nospace_error&) {
00247             abort();
00248         }
00249     }
00250     //! This is not reentrant.
00251     T &front() {
00252         return m_array[key2index(m_queue.front())];
00253     }
00254     //! This is not reentrant.
00255     bool empty() const {
00256         return m_queue.empty();
00257     }
00258     unsigned int size() const {
00259         return m_queue.size();
00260     }
00261 
00262     //! Try to pop the front item.
00263     //! \arg item to be released.
00264     //! \return true if succeeded.
00265     bool atomicPop(key item) {
00266         if(m_queue.atomicPop(item)) {
00267             try {
00268                 m_reservoir.push(item);
00269             }
00270             catch (nospace_error&) {
00271                 abort();
00272             }
00273             return true;
00274         }
00275         return false;
00276     }
00277     //! Try to obtain the front item.
00278     key atomicFront(T *val) {
00279         key pack = m_queue.atomicFront();
00280         if(pack)
00281             *val = m_array[key2index(pack)];
00282         return pack;
00283     }
00284 private:
00285     int key2index(key i) {return (unsigned int)i / 0x100;}
00286     int key2serial(key i) {return ((unsigned int)i % 0x100) - 1;}
00287     key key_index_serial(int index, int serial) {return index * 0x100 + (serial % 0xff) + 1;}
00288     atomic_nonzero_pod_queue<key, SIZE> m_queue, m_reservoir;
00289     T m_array[SIZE];
00290 };
00291 
00292 #endif /*ATOMIC_QUEUE_H_*/
